General.Name: Russkaya Akvakultura PAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Inarctica engages in the farming and distribution of fish and caviar in the Republic of Karelia and Murmansk region, Russia. It engages in the commercial farming of atlantic salmon and sea trout. The company was formerly known as PJSC Russian Aquaculture and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company Inarctica in August 2022. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.
